{"id":690076618,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1651301791,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/690076618/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Integer to Roman","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string intToRoman(int num) {\n        //1000,900,500,400,100,90,50,40,10,9,5,4,1;\n        string ans=\"\";\n        int n=num;\n        while(n>0){\n            if(n>=1000){\n                ans+=\"M\";\n                n-=1000;\n            } \n            else if(n>=900){\n                 ans+=\"CM\";\n                n-=900;\n            }\n            else if(n>=500){\n                 ans+=\"D\";\n                n-=500;\n            }\n            else if(n>=400){\n                 ans+=\"CD\";\n                n-=400;\n            }\n            else if(n>=100){\n                ans+=\"C\";\n                n-=100;\n            } \n            else if(n>=90){\n                 ans+=\"XC\";\n                n-=90;\n            }\n             else if(n>=50){\n                 ans+=\"L\";\n                n-=50;\n            }\n            else if(n>=40){\n                 ans+=\"XL\";\n                n-=40;\n            }\n             else if(n>=10){\n                ans+=\"X\";\n                n-=10;\n            } \n            else if(n>=9){\n                 ans+=\"IX\";\n                n-=9;\n            }\n             else if(n>=5){\n                 ans+=\"V\";\n                n-=5;\n            }\n            else if(n>=4){\n                 ans+=\"IV\";\n                n-=4;\n            }\n            else if(n>=1){\n                ans+=\"I\";\n                n-=1;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"integer-to-roman","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
